title: Hail, peaceful day! let thy glorious world rejoice
author: Lowell Mason

verses.text:
Hail, peaceful day! let thy glorious world rejoice,
Hail, memorial of that sacred rest
Of what creation's mighty King
The hallowed time to men was given,
A foretaste of the bliss of heaven.

Hark! through the earth-encircling courts above
What rapturous praises echo now!
Around that holy law of love
Seraphs in adoration bow;
Let earth respond to the strain,
Exalt alone Jehovah's name.

O come, thou bright, immortal day!
When at his temple all adore,
And own his universal sway
Then Zion shall in triumph reign,
And Eden bloom on earth again.
